channel.title: Blogs on tane.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on tane.dev

item.title: New blog (aka 'Hey I'm Moving From Medium')
item.description: Today I’ve set up my new independent blog tane.dev - it’s something to do with my newly owned .dev url but also recently I’ve been dissatisfied with the way Medium has dealt with recent changes. I am not going to go into this, but plenty of discussion can be found on Twitter. Over the course of the next few weeks, I’m planning to migrate my content over to this site, which is generated with Hugo and served via GitHub Pages.
